Description_lang: Every $?c1[$s1]?c2[$s3][$s2] Rage you spend$?c1[ on attacks][] reduces the remaining cooldown on $?c1&s262161[Warbreaker, Bladestorm, and Ravager]?c1[Colossus Smash, Bladestorm, and Ravager]?c2[Recklessness, Bladestorm, and Ravager][Avatar and Shield Wall] by 1 sec.

description_blz.en_US: Every 20 Rage you spend on attacks reduces the remaining cooldown on Colossus Smash, Bladestorm, and Ravager by 1 sec.
description_blz.es_MX: Cada 20 p. de ira que gastas en ataques, se reduce 1 s el tiempo de reutilización restante de Machaque colosal, Filotormenta y Devastador.
description_blz.pt_BR: Cada 20 de Raiva gasta em ataques reduz em 1 s a recarga restante de Golpe Colossal, Tornado de Aço e Assolador.
description_blz.de_DE: Pro 20 für Angriffe verbrauchter Wut wird die verbleibende Abklingzeit von 'Kolossales Schmettern', 'Klingensturm' und 'Verheerer' um 1 Sek. verringert.
description_blz.en_GB: Every 20 Rage you spend on attacks reduces the remaining cooldown on Colossus Smash, Bladestorm, and Ravager by 1 sec.
description_blz.es_ES: Por cada 20 p. de ira que gastas en ataques, se reduce 1 s el tiempo de reutilización restante de Machaque colosal, Filotormenta y Devastador.
description_blz.fr_FR: Chaque fois que vous dépensez 20 points de rage  avec des attaques, les temps de recharge restants de Frappe du colosse, Tempête de lames et Ravageur sont réduits de 1 s.
description_blz.it_IT: Ogni 20 rabbia consumata attaccando, il tempo di recupero restante di Colpo del Colosso, Tempesta di Lame e Impeto Devastatore si riduce di 1 s.
description_blz.ru_RU: За каждые 20 ед. затраченной на атаки ярости время восстановления "Удара колосса", "Вихря клинков" и "Опустошителя" сокращается на 1 сек.
description_blz.ko_KR: 20의 분노를 소모할 때마다 공격 시 거인의 강타, 칼날폭풍, 쇠날발톱의 남은 재사용 대기시간이 1초만큼 감소합니다.
description_blz.zh_TW: 攻擊時，你每消耗20點怒氣，都會使千鈞潰擊、劍刃風暴和劫毀旋刃的剩餘冷卻時間縮短1秒。
description_blz.zh_CN: 每消耗20点怒气用于攻击，就会使巨人打击、剑刃风暴和破坏者的剩余冷却时间缩短1秒。
